There is the New Jerusalem, "having the glory of God," her light "like unto a stone most precious, even like a jasper stone, clear as crystal." [Revelation 21:11.] Saith the Lord, "I will  rejoice in Jerusalem, and joy in my people." [Isaiah 65:19.] "The tabernacle of God is with men, and he will dwell with them, and they shall be his people, 
                                                                           491
and God himself shall be with them, and be their God, And God shall wipe away all tears from their eyes; and there shall be no more death, neither sorrow nor crying, neither shall there be any more pain; for the former things are passed away." [Revelation 21:3, 4.]
